prompt: Sport & Fitness Activity is Walking, Hiking & Camping. Washing Instructions is Hand Wash Only. Brand is Merrell. Occasion Type is Casual. Shoe Or Boot Style is Sports Trainers. Main Shoe Material is Leather. Fabric Features is Gore-tex. Fastening is Lace-Up. Material is Upper: leather, Sole: rubber.
completion:
For over a decade, the Merrell® MOAB has been the choice of hikers when a choice needs to be made, making it the bestselling hiker in the world. Famous for its out-of-the-box comfort, durability and all-purpose versatility, its predecessors have enabled 20 million people to step further outdoors.
This iteration features a GORE-TEX® waterproof membrane to keep your feet dry while still allowing your feet to breathe, a new more supportive insole, a softer more cushioned midsole, and a best-in-class Vibram® outsole.  END

prompt: Washing Instructions is Do Not Wash. Brand is Geox. Occasion Type is Casual. Main Shoe Material is Suede. Shoe Or Boot Style is Chukka & Desert Boots. Fastening is Lace-Up. Comfort and Fit is Wide Fit. Toe Detail is Closed Toe, Round. Material is Upper: suede, Lining: leather/fabric, Sole: rubber.
completion:
Paying homage to the original military style, these boots from Geox have a luxe texture in premium suede.
Lacing up for everyday ease, they are the perfect complement to jeans and your favourite tee.
The classic Geox rubber sole is based on an exclusive patent: the combination of the perforated sole and the resistant breathable and waterproof membrane allow for natural temperature regulation, thereby creating the perfect microclimate inside the shoe that keeps feet dry and comfortable for the whole day. END

prompt: Sport & Fitness Activity is Walking, Hiking & Camping. Washing Instructions is Hand Wash Only. Brand is Merrell. Occasion Type is Casual. Shoe Or Boot Style is Walking. Main Shoe Material is Nubuck. Fabric Features is Breathable, Gore-tex, Lightweight, Moisture Resistant, Temperature Regulating, Waterproof. Comfort and Fit is Flexible Sole, Underfoot Cushioning. Material is Upper: synthetic textile, Sole: rubber.
completion:
The Moab Speed takes the innovations of the archival Moab and updates them for the ever-changing trail. Built on the solid foundational rock plate, the Moab Speed features recycled laces, lining and footbed. The shoe is fitted with FloatPro® and a new Vibram Traction Lug outsole design for added traction and stability.

Merrell universally equips all their boots, shoes, trainers and sandals with a Vibram outsole. Lightweight, super grippy and longlasting, the Italian mountaineering company are called upon by Merrell due to their renowned status for designing soles with excellent traction and structured comfort. From hard-packed snow and forest floors to bare rock and loose rubble terrains, there's not a corner of the world that Vibram hasn't already conquered.
Highly abrasion and water-resistant, over 70 years of outerwear knowledge and experience has gone into this design. Built with a unique lug pattern that allows the foot to flex more naturally, the specially-designed metal shanks give you greater balance and comfort when exploring uneven terrain. Essential for any adventurer looking to explore on and off the beaten path. END

prompt: Sport & Fitness Activity is Walking, Hiking & Camping. Washing Instructions is Machine Washable. Brand is The North Face. Occasion Type is Casual. Shoe Or Boot Style is Walking. Main Shoe Material is Textile. Fabric Features is Breathable, Moisture Resistant, Sweat Resistant (Wicking), Waterproof. Fastening is Lace-Up. Comfort and Fit is Flexible Sole, Underfoot Cushioning. Material is Upper: synthetic textile, Sole: rubber.
completion:
The Hedgehogs are TNF's classic, tried and tested hiking shoes built for versatility and comfort balanced with a lower profile and weight than boots.
For this new iteration, they've harnessed breathable FUTURELIGHT™ technology for the membrane. The soles are zonally fine-tuned with CRADLE™: the toe area gives added stiffness over rocky terrain, and the heel shape is optimised for comfort.
The Ortholite® insoles maintain their cushioning power over the long term and the durable Vibram® XS Trek outer soles deliver the optimal balance of traction and durability without adding unnecessary weight or bulk.
 END

prompt: Sport & Fitness Activity is Walking, Hiking & Camping. Washing Instructions is Hand Wash Only. Brand is On. Occasion Type is Casual. Shoe Or Boot Style is Walking. Main Shoe Material is Textile. Performance Running Type is Cushioned. Fabric Features is Breathable. Comfort and Fit is Flexible Sole, Underfoot Cushioning. Material is Upper: synthetic textile, Sole: rubber.
completion:
The more you run or walk, the more room you need. On trainers and boots are typically designed narrower in the heel and tongue; please consider going up a size if you have wide feet.
Designed to be the lightest fully cushioned running shoe, the Cloud is a true On icon. Since launching in 2014, it's topped Olympic podiums and walked Parisian catwalks, winning awards and fans all over the world. Stylishly concealing state of the art running technology, the Cloud is the perfect performance shoe for all day, every day wear. It's the best-selling On for a reason.

 Say Hi to a new breed of shoe. The Cloud Hi takes the comfort and performance of the iconic Cloud to a new level, ready to find adventure in every day and inspiration on the move. For travel and exploration, it’s literally a cut above. It’s Never Not On.

 Hi by name, high in tech and performance. The Cloud Hi is engineered with a specially crafted Speedboard™ and CloudTec® cushioning technology. The result is an urban adventure shoe that's really made to move.

 The Cloud Hi combines vegan leather and suede with durable canvas. Its higher protective profile is tough enough for the demands of the city and next-level in look and feel. And with the Looplock speed-lacing system, you're always ready to step it up. Just Clip. Then Go. END

prompt: Sport & Fitness Activity is Walking, Hiking & Camping. Washing Instructions is Sponge Clean Only. Brand is Haglöfs. Occasion Type is Casual. Shoe Or Boot Style is Walking. Main Shoe Material is Leather. Material is Upper: synthetic leather, Sole: rubber.
completion:
Welcome to modern hiking. Blisters, uncomfortable soles, tricky terrain and soggy socks no more; these tough walking boots from Haglöfs are here for the long path ahead.


Complete with a wide forefoot fit for extra comfort, Haglöfs are serious about keeping your feet dry. Their waterproof outer has been flex tested over 100,000 steps to ensure long term protection. Even the tongue gusset has been designed to prevent water and sand from entering and causing irritation.
Protection isn't just about repelling the elements though. Thanks to the GEL rearfoot cushioning system, the midsole absorbs impact on uneven and rocky terrain so that you're able to take in the views instead of just focusing on your next step. Working in conjunction with the AHAR rubber on the outsole, the structured comfort and durability means it's never your gear that'll cause you to stop either; you can push for the summit until the sun goes down.
Haglöfs are also committed to creating an eco-conscious manufacturing process. The design comes completely fluorocarbon free, down to the waterproof PROOF™ ECO, so you can walk down the trail knowing that you're not leaving behind a damaging legacy. END

From town to trail, the TERRAVENTURE URBAN MID does it in style. This mid-cut boot combines outstanding comfort with an everyday, urban look. The upper consists of premium quality, highly breathable and water repellent suede leather. The boot has a rubber toe protector, and the heel is supported and stabilised with robust PU. An ergonomic VIBRAM outsole and an EVA midsole provide good cushioning and ease the strain on the foot during long walks. The boot is also sustainably manufactured. We have used recycled rubber for the sole, and the lining and other textile components are made from recycled materials.
 END
